Package commands

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeDirectory, ClientUrl, Concatenate, Copy, Echo, Exit, History, ListContents, LoadJShell, MakeDirectory, Manual, Move, PopDirectory, PrintWorkingDirectory, PushDirectory, Redirection, Remove, SaveJShell, Search, Tree
    public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandInterface
    Command is the super class which defines the structure of all commands, their constants and how to access them, and the method run to run them.

        public static boolean containsArrow​(java.lang.String[] tokens)
        Checks if the tokens contains arrow or double_arrow
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • run

        public Command run​(java.lang.String[] tokens,

        Parameters:
